item.description:
An opportunity for members of all the local secular organizations, as well as persons who have not previously been active in the secular community, to come together and get to know one another. As the largest secular membership organization in New England, let's make a good showing.

Information about the newly-launched Secular Coalition for Massachusetts will be available, and attendees will have the chance to talk with SC/MA organizers about ways to help the SC/MA accomplish its mission of increasing the visibility of and respect for nontheistic viewpoints, and of protecting and strengthening the secular character of our government as the best guarantee of freedom for all.

If you're interested in the project of the SC/MA, connect with its members and organizers at http://www.facebook.com/groups/secularmass/ and http://www.meetup.com/Secular-Massachusetts, or LIKE its official Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/pages/Secular-Coalition-for-Massachusetts/313179808768110.

To sign-up as a supporter of the SC/MA -- whether as a donor, a volunteer, a committee leader, or a lobbyist -- visit http://bit.ly/join-scma.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the bar area.
item.name: SC/MA - Boston Meet-and-Greet
